title: Just moved to Surfside Beach from southern Indiana looking for a oldies country radio station, not the new station like Waylon Willie 50 60 70 is there one here thanks Sherry
text:
Not sure exactly what you're looking for, but here is a list of all the broadcast stations in our area:



http://radio-locator.com/cgi-bin/locate?select=city&city=Wilmington&state=NC
